name: crow-media-gallery
description: Media gallery react component work with crow-ligthbox-reader to show selectable gallery of media with lightbox render on click audio video and image  ...

scripts.comp: rm -r -f ./lib; mkdir -p ./lib ; cp -f ./src/CrowMediaGallery.css ./lib/  ; npx babel  ./src/CrowMediaGallery.js -o ./lib/CrowMediaGallery.js ; minify ./lib ; rm -f ./lib/CrowMediaGallery.css; mv ./lib/CrowMediaGallery.min.css ./lib/CrowMediaGallery.css

author: InitialCrow
